divs: Sighting Detailsmysterious line if light bobbing around up and down erratically with some zig zagging left to right. The line disappeared and then reappeared, it then separated into two lines for several seconds and the reformed as one thicker line. By the time my husband returned with my camera it was in a one line formation . Photo 1 is a zoom in, photo2 and 3 are unedited. I have 8 clear pictures but I am only able to upload 3.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Saratoga
There were no other sightings in Saratoga on or around September 2nd 2009
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Summary: a Fuzzy Line of Light visible in daylight
